en.voxelaming.name: Voxelaming
en.voxelaming.setNode: Set node at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL]
en.voxelaming.animateNode: Animate node at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] scale: [SCALE] interval: [INTERVAL]
en.voxelaming.createBox: Create voxel at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] r: [R] g: [G] b: [B]
en.voxelaming.removeBox: Remove voxel at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z]

ja.voxelaming.name: ボクセラミング
ja.voxelaming.setRoomName: ルームネームを [ROOMNAME] にする
ja.voxelaming.setNode: ノードを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] に配置する。角度を pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] にする
ja.voxelaming.animateNode: アニメーション移動 x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] 。回転 pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] 。拡大: [SCALE] 移動時間: [INTERVAL]
ja.voxelaming.createBox: ボクセルを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] に作成する。色 r: [R] g: [G] b: [B]
ja.voxelaming.removeBox: ボクセルを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] から削除する
ja.voxelaming.setBoxSize: ボクセルサイズを [BOXSIZE] にする
ja.voxelaming.setBuildInterval: ボクセルの作成間隔を [INTERVAL] 秒にする
ja.voxelaming.setSentences: [SENTENCES] を x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] に書く。色 r: [R] g: [G] b: [B]

ja-Hira.voxelaming.name: ボクセラミング
ja-Hira.voxelaming.setRoomName: ルームネームを [ROOMNAME] にする
ja-Hira.voxelaming.setNode: ノードを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] におく。かくどを pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] にする
ja-Hira.voxelaming.animateNode: アニメーションいどう x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] 。かいてん pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] 。かくだい: [SCALE] じかん: [INTERVAL]
ja-Hira.voxelaming.createBox: ボクセルを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] につくる。いろ r: [R] g: [G] b: [B]
ja-Hira.voxelaming.removeBox: ボクセルを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] からけす
ja-Hira.voxelaming.setBoxSize: ボクセルサイズを [BOXSIZE] にする
ja-Hira.voxelaming.setBuildInterval: ボクセルのつくるかんかくを [INTERVAL] びょうにする
ja-Hira.voxelaming.setSentences: [SENTENCES] を x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] にかく。いろ r: [R] g: [G] b: [B]
